page.title: 11BARNS GREEN VILLAGE HALL
page.content: THE PRESENT{VILLAGE HALL}WAS BUILT IN 1958. IT WAS PAID FOR BY PEOPLE COLLECTING WASTE PAPER/MILK BOTTLE TOPS AND SELLING THEM. MRS UPTON GAVE A GIFT OF Â£5000 TOWARDS IT AND IN THE END THEY RAISED Â£8000. IT IS USED FOR CLUBS AND SHOWS. CASUAL USES ARE MAINLY FOR WEDDINGS, JUMBLE SALES, ETC. IT IS THE 2nd VILLAGE HALL, THE FIRST WAS BUILT IN 1887 NEXT DOOR TO SANDHILLS, AN OLD HOUSE JUST OUT OF BARNS GREEN.{THE VILLAGE QUIZ}HAS BECOME AN ANNUAL COMPETITION WHICH STARTED IN 1975.THE IDEA WAS A MONEY RAISING EVENT TO HELP PAY FOR THE DRAINING OF THE VILLAGE GREEN.MOST OF THE LOCAL CLUBS TAKE PART,EACH YEAR IT IS ORGANISED BY THE TEAM WHO PREVIOUSLY WON IT.EACH TEAM CONSISTS OF THREE MEMBERS.THE SUBJECTS ARE SPORT,HISTORY,GENERAL KNOWLEDGE, CURRENT AFFAIRS,MUSIC,FASHION ETC.
